overview.description: Himachal Pradesh, nestled in the Himalayas, is known for its snow-capped peaks, lush valleys, and adventure sports. Established as a state on January 25, 1971, it offers destinations like Shimla and Manali.

top_destinations.name: Shimla
top_destinations.description: The 'Queen of Hills' with colonial architecture and Mall Road.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit the Ridge; take the toy train.

top_destinations.name: Manali
top_destinations.description: A paradise for adventure lovers with Hadimba Temple and Solang Valley.

top_destinations.name: Dharamshala
top_destinations.description: Home to the Dalai Lama with stunning views of the Dhauladhar range.
top_destinations.travel_tips: Visit McLeod Ganj; explore Tibetan culture.

culinary_delights.name: The Himalayan Cafe
culinary_delights.description: Famous for local dishes like dham and siddu.

culinary_delights.name: Chopsticks
culinary_delights.description: Popular for Tibetan and Chinese cuisine.

culinary_delights.name: Cafe Dal Lake
culinary_delights.description: Cozy spot for coffee and snacks.

culinary_delights.name: Taste of India
culinary_delights.description: Offers a variety of Indian and international food.

culinary_delights.name: McLlo Restaurant
culinary_delights.description: Famous for continental and Himachali fusion.

must_visit_spots.name: Rohtang Pass
must_visit_spots.description: A high mountain pass ideal for snow adventures.

must_visit_spots.name: Kullu Valley
must_visit_spots.description: Known for apple orchards and the Beas River.

must_visit_spots.name: McLeod Ganj
must_visit_spots.description: A cultural hub with Tibetan monasteries.

must_visit_spots.name: Kasauli
must_visit_spots.description: A quiet hill station with colonial charm.
must_visit_spots.tip: Enjoy a walk on the Gilbert Trail.

must_visit_spots.name: Spiti Valley
must_visit_spots.description: A remote valley with stunning landscapes.
must_visit_spots.tip: Plan a road trip during summer months.

must_visit_spots.name: Kinnaur
must_visit_spots.description: Known for orchards and the Kinnaur Kailash peak.
must_visit_spots.tip: Visit Sangla Valley for scenic beauty.

travel_essentials.how_to_reach: By road: Shimla is 350 km from Delhi (NH5, 7-8 hrs). By train: Kalka to Shimla toy train. By air: Jubbarhatti Airport (Shimla).
travel_essentials.tips: Carry warm clothing; book in advance during peak season.
